content: which company is hiring and what skills are required

The companies hiring are Appvin Technologies and GoTrust. The required skills vary by position:

For **React.js**:
- HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React.js, API Integration, Version Control (Git).

For **Python**:
- Python, OOP, Algorithms, Django/Flask basics, SQL, HTML/CSS.

For **Node.js**:
- Express.js, RESTful APIs, Asynchronous Programming, NPM, JSON, Security.

Job Title: Trainee Software Developer
We are inviting freshers from the batch of 2025 to join our company Appvin
Technologies & GoTrust as Software Trainees. We are looking for talented and
smart individuals who are problem solvers at heart and possess strong computer
science fundamentals.

AppVin Technologies is an innovative firm that started with five lean scrum
developers in 2020, and now AppVin has more than 100 advanced IT specialists
globally. Our solutions leverage top industry skills, qualifications, and experience to
ensure seamless business growth for our clients.
Website Link- https://appvintech.com

Go Trust is a pioneering provider of comprehensive privacy and digital trust

offers a suite of cutting-edge products designed to address the complex challenges of
modern data governance and regulatory compliance.
